name: Asphalt Fury
summary: Prepare for the ultimate adrenaline rush with Asphalt Fury, a high-speed racing game built for Meta Quest. Immerse yourself in neon-lit tracks, blazing trails, and intense challenges. Customise your cars, conquer tight corners, and rise to the top. With stunning visuals and tight controls, Asphalt Fury delivers the definitive VR racing thrill.
